mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MBR_MST SET CD_STATE = 8 WHERE SEQ_MBR = #{seq_mbr}
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM TB_MBR_MST WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND MBR_NM = #{mbr_nm}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TB_MBR_MST WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(NICKNAME) FROM TB_MBR_MST WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT PASSWD FROM TB_MBR_MST WHERE SEQ_MBR = #{seq_mbr}

SELECT mst.SEQ_MBR , mst.EMAIL , mst.ID , mst.Nickname , mst.MBR_NM , mst.GENDER , mst.PHONE , mst.PETS , dtl.POST , dtl.ADDR1 , dtl.ADDR2 , dtl.FLG_EMAIL , dtl.FLG_SMS FROM TB_MBR_MST mst INNER JOIN TB_MBR_DTL dtl ON mst.SEQ_MBR = dtl.SEQ_MBR WHERE mst.SEQ_MBR = #{seq_mbr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MBR_MST (SEQ_MBR, ID, PASSWD, NICKNAME, CD_STATE, FLG_PETS, PETS, EMAIL, MBR_NM, GENDER, PHONE, DT_REG, REGISTER) VALUES (#{seq_mbr}, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{nickname}, 1, #{flg_pets}, #{pets}, #{email}, #{mbr_nm}, #{gender}, #{phone}, SYSDATE, #{register})
INSERT INTO TB_MBR_DTL (SEQ_MBR, POST, ADDR1, ADDR2, FLG_SMS, DT_SMS, FLG_EMAIL, DT_EMAIL) VALUES (#{seq_mbr}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{flg_sms}, SYSDATE, #{flg_email}, SYSDATE)
